translation.firstMainSub: If you delete your account, you will not be able to log in with this user ID and all of your information will be permanently removed.
translation.firstMainLabel: And you need to agree to delete the following information:
translation.personalDataIntro: Your personal Data include Email address, Nickname will be removed.
translation.consumptionHistory: Consumption History, Recharge History, Chapter Unlock History, Series in My List.
translation.allYourCoins: All of your coins and reward coins will be deducted.
translation.ifYouHave: If you have purchased an auto-renewable subscription on this platform, you need to manually cancel the subscription on the app store after deleting your account.
translation.pleaseLog: Please log out of the account on other devices in time, otherwise the App on other devices will be unavailable.
translation.youCanGo: You can go to User Profile - Settings - Account Deletion, or you can click the button at the bottom of this page to request deletion of your account.
translation.iAccept: I accept the deletion risk and agree to delete my account
translation.toastYouNeed: You need to agree to delete the following information.
translation.failedToDelete: We couldn't delete the account at this time. Please try again.
translation.afterDeleting: After deleting the account, you cannot recover its data again. Are you sure you want to delete it?
translation.theAccount1: The account you entered is not bound to a user ID in
translation.theAccount2: . Please switch accounts and try again.
translation.networkErr: The network is unstable, please try again
